message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to let it go for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can work out a better deal. I'd like to propose $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great value for the product, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose $110 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can do $125, but that's my final offer. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it!
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose $120 for the product.
